article: Dear Sandy, My family and I are in Nanjing, China. We are very happy. I am a  _  in No. 11 Middle School. Is our school  _  ? No, it isn't very big, but it's very beautiful. There  _  any swimming pools in it. But our school  has  two basketball courts. There is a garden and many tall trees in our school. There are about fifteen  _  in our school. I am in Class2,Grade1. My classroom is  _  the second floor in the building. There are twenty girls and twenty--five boys in my class. Miss Li is our English teacher.  _  comes from the USA. She often goes to Chinese classes to study Chinese in the evening. Now she  _  Chinese well. She likes  working  in China. Miss Li is a very good teacher. We all like her very much. May you be  _  ! Hope to see you soon. Yours Lily
